SQL.statement: CREATE TABLESPACE MYSMS1 MANAGED BY AUTOMATIC STORAGE
CREATE TABLESPACE MYSMS2 MANAGED BY AUTOMATIC STORAGE
CREATE TABLESPACE MYSMS3 MANAGED BY AUTOMATIC STORAGE

CREATE TABLE "WITHMDC"( "ID" BIGINT NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY( START WITH 0 INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 0 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 NO CYCLE NO CACHE NO ORDER) PRIMARY KEY, "NAME" BIGINT, "LiSp" CHAR(5), "cost" decimal(5,2)) DATA CAPTURE CHANGES PARTITION BY RANGE("ID") ( PART "part0" STARTING(MINVALUE) EXCLUSIVE ENDING(5) IN "MYSMS1", PART "part1" STARTING(6) ENDING(10) IN "MYSMS2", PART "part2" STARTING(11) ENDING(15) IN "MYSMS3") ORGANIZE BY (("NAME"), ("LiSp", "cost"))

CREATE TABLE WITHMDC1( "ID" BIGINT NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY( START WITH 0 INCREMENT BY 1 MINVALUE 0 MAXVALUE 9223372036854775807 NO CYCLE NO CACHE NO ORDER) PRIMARY KEY, "NAME" BIGINT generated always as (ID+1), "LiSp" CHAR(5), "cost" decimal(5,2)) DATA CAPTURE CHANGES PARTITION BY RANGE("ID") ( PART "part0" STARTING(MINVALUE) EXCLUSIVE ENDING(5) IN "MYSMS1", PART "part1" STARTING(6) ENDING(10) IN "MYSMS2", PART "part2" STARTING(11) ENDING(15) IN "MYSMS3") ORGANIZE BY (("NAME"), ("LiSp", "cost"))
ALTER TABLE WITHMDC1 DETACH PARTITION "part0" INTO WITHMDC1_old
